name: City Car Lifter Parking Game
description: city car lifter parking game is a simulation game. Get the experience of thrill and excitement in this city car lifter parking game from the roadside. As a city police officer there is a forklift challenge for you to remove the unwanted and wrong-parked cars from the no parking zone around the city and shopping areas with the help of lifter. There are multiple vehicle which are wrongly parked to various locations in city so your job is to pick up and move at the parking places. You have to drive very careful in this car lift parking. Do not drop down the car or destroy it. This is a simulation game where you have to pick up the role of a traffic officer whose responsibility is to keep the city clear for traffic.
